param.name: smt
param.doc: Enable usage of hyperthreaded cores if available on current architecture.

param.name: cores
param.doc: Default number of cores if -c=X is not given to mpcrun.

param.name: verbosity
param.doc: Default verbosity level from 0 to 3. Can be override by -vv on mpcrun.

param.name: banner
param.doc: Display the MPC banner at launch time to print some informations about the topology. Can be override by MPC_DISABLE_BANNER.

param.name: autokill
param.doc: Automatically kill the MPC processes after a given timeout. Use 0 to disable. Can be override by MPC_AUTO_KILL_TIMEOUT.

param.name: user_launchers
param.doc: Permit to extend the launchers available via 'mpcrun -l=...' by providing scripts (named mpcrun_XXXX) in a user directory. Can be override by MPC_USER_LAUNCHERS.
